start.title: Setup OpenWeatherMap
start.intro: Enter your API key and a name.
start.required: API key is a required value.
start.optional: Optional: enter the location for the weather data, City,countrycode:
start.autolocation: When left blank Homey's location will be used.
start.forecastInterval3h: Number of 3-hour forecast intervals ahead of current time for forecast:
start.forecastIntervalDays: Number of days ahead for the long-term forecast:
start.name: Give your OpenWeatherMap sensor a name:

oneCallAPI.title: OpenWeather - add a location...
oneCallAPI.titleDailySummary: OpenWeather - add a daily summary (historical data and 4 day forecast)...
oneCallAPI.apiKey2: An API key can be obtained at http://openweathermap.org.
oneCallAPI.apiVersion: Specifies the OneCall API version to use.
oneCallAPI.autolocation: When left blank Homey's location will be used.
oneCallAPI.hours: Enter the hour difference for the forecast.
oneCallAPI.hours2: Examples: '0' for a current prediction. '5' for a forecast in 5 hours.
oneCallAPI.days: Enter the day difference for the forecast.
oneCallAPI.days2: Examples: '0' for a current prediction. '5' for a forecast in 5 days.
oneCallAPI.daysSummary: Enter the day difference for the historical data or forecast.
oneCallAPI.daysSummary2: Examples: '0' for a current day. '-1' for summary of yesterday. '4' for a forecast in 4 days.
oneCallAPI.apiKeyError: Please enter a valid API key.
oneCallAPI.geolocationError2: Please check the city name you entered.
oneCallAPI.locationError1: There is no weather location available.
oneCallAPI.locationError2: Please add a device for 'Current Weather' first.
oneCallAPI.instructions01:
To use this device, you need an OneCall API 3.0 key.
The key needs a subscription, but includes 1000 free API calls daily.
Please check OWM price list for details, create an account and subscribe your OneCall 3.0 API key.
oneCallAPI.instructions02: If you already used an old API key (without subscription) with the OneCall API 2.5, you can also use this key. Select 'API version 2.5' in pair view or device settings.

freeAPI.instructions01:
To use this device, you need an Free API key.
The key includes 1000 free API calls daily.
Please check OWM price list for details, create an account and get your FreeAPI key.
